problem.markdown:
Which of the following is the best way to speed up computers today? ( ) Cooling Systems (x) Multiple Cores ( ) Decreased Power Usage ( ) All are equally useful
[explanation] According to Moore's Law, using more and more cooling systems will bring us to a dead end and overheating computers. Using multiple cores, however, allows us to use the same power for each operations but faster than before. Therefore, we have a win-win situation. [explanation]
